text: Burnt Offerings is a 1976 American Italian horror movie directed by Dan Curtis and based on the 1973 novel of the same name by Robert Marasco. It stars Karen Black, Oliver Reed, Bette Davis, Lee H. Montgomery, Burgess Meredith and Eileen Heckart and was distributed by United Artists. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1976 horror movies Category:American horror thriller movies Category:Italian horror movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Dan Curtis Category:1970s English-language movies Category:Haunted house movies Category:American supernatural movies Category:1976 thriller movies Category:Movies set in California Category:Movies set in country houses Category:Movies about vacationing Category:Movies about dysfunctional families
title: Burnt Offerings
